question: Sachin: A Billion Dreams wins __________ awards in 11th Tehran International FICTS Festival 2018.
explanation: "Sachin: A Billion Dreams", a biopic on Sachin Tendulkar, has won two awards at the 11th Tehran International FICTS Festival 2018, in Iran. Helmer James Erskine won the the Best Director of a Long Documentary trophy and an honorary diploma for "Sachin - A Billion Dreams". Producer of "Sachin - A Billion Dreams" Ravi Bhagchandka won the Special Award for the Best Film in the Long Documentary section.
